document_data.name: The Veiled Vampiress
document_data.mainbody: '''The Veiled Vampiress''' was a [[festhall]] and tavern in the [[Amn]]ian city of [[Esmeltaran]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The place was built in the north end of the city, near the northern gates.
document_data.Services: The Veiled Vampiress was actually run by two [[vampire]]s who secretly fed on random guests and avoided discovery. Despite this, it offered excellent service at very cheap prices.
